name: beepmetro
description: An app that tells you public transport timetable and beep you to go for it according to your walking distance, and more.

scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.install: npm install *client && npm install *server && npm run build
scripts.start: npm run install && npm run serve
scripts.heroku:push1: cd *server && git checkout heroku; cd - && npm run build:server
scripts.heroku:push2: cd *server && git add . ; git commit -m 'new' ; git push heroku heroku:master ; git checkout master
scripts.heroku: npm run heroku:push1 && npm run heroku:push2
